Slow Level Experience

01 Apr 2014

Slow Level Experience #01 is an acousmatic composition. Maybe. While I was working on Decadenze which is a work I had made from percussion sounds, I have developed a kind of sound processing that generated long sound structures. One of these structures proved to be immediately interesting to me. So in addition to insert a statement in the song for which it was created, I decided to keep it in an autonomous form. jump


Slow Level Experience by Giuseppe Silvi is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 4.0 International License.

Decadenze

31 Mar 2014

DECADENZE is an acousmatic composition. jump

It was premiered at MAXXI (National Museum of XXI Century Arts) 29 March 2014 during the MAXXI LIVE MUSIC Contemporary Concerts as a Acousmatic Prelude to the Minimalism experience percussion concert.


Decadenze by Giuseppe Silvi is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 4.0 International License.

NYCEMF

29 Mar 2014

STUDIO. CTHIAS. a work for piano & electronics was selected to the next New York City Electroacoustic Music Festival from 2 to 8 June 2014. Accepted Works to the 2014 NYCEMF

MAXXI live music

28 Mar 2014

Saturday 20140329 - DECADENZE acousmatic prelude to percussions concert “Minimalism experience”. -> jump

Hello World!

27 Mar 2014

giuseppesilvi.com is based on Hyde theme.

Hyde is a brazen two-column Jekyll theme that pairs a prominent sidebar with uncomplicated content. It's based on Poole, the Jekyll butler.
